SIMPLE DOMAIN MANAGING LOW ON RESIN? ALARMS FOR EACH EVENT
GET STARTED
GenshinPlanner uses a simple calendar face to manage drop farming. Each week has its own counter, so you can plan ahead your route. "Each event creates a base alarm so you won't miss any precious resin!"
